info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

get.description: Fetch generations from the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new generation to the database.

put.description: Update one or more generations in the database.

get.description: Fetch Generation using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more generations from the Database.
